testcase.name: DBA.TM20
testcase.description: DBA.TM20: ReportingPeriodEndDate with either no dimensionality or the dimension of TypeOfReportingPeriodDimension:AllReportingPeriodsMember must only be tagged once.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: ReportingPeriodEndDate appears twice, one with no dimensionality the other with the dimension of TypeOfReportingPeriodDimension:AllReportingPeriodsMember
